item.description:
The Plan:

1) Meet at The Black Rose at 9pm for drinks and mixer. This is a fun Irish bar with a casual environment. It is MUCH easier to meet everyone first, and THEN head over to the club. (160 State St, near Quincy Market, 617-536-4477)

2) Head over to Aqua at 10pm (120 Water Street, between Broad and Kilby). I've been wanting to go here for some time, and I've heard lots of good things about this place.

If you can't make it to The Black Rose, you can try to meet us at Aqua....

I will be getting in touch with those who RSVP, so be sure to respond! All are welcome. See you THIS SATURDAY on Dec. 10! - Charlie



For more information, see http://www.aquaboston...

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: This Saturday Night - Aqua! (near Quincy Market)
